en.daily.uploads.disable: To disable the daily upload for {system,plural,one{this system} other{these systems}}, use the following command:
en.system.remove.info: {systemToRemove} {system,plural,one{} other{systems}} will be removed from all {host} applications and services. You need to re - register the {system,plural,one{ system } other{ systems }} to add it back to your inventory.
